DOC.brief_summary: The purposes of this study are to evaluate the long-term safety and intraocular pressure-lowering efficacy of DE-117 ophthalmic solution monotherapy and concomitant use of DE-117 ophthalmic solution with timolol ophthalmic solution 0.5% in patients with open angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: A Long-term Study of DE-117 Ophthalmic Solution Monotherapy and Concomitant Use of DE-117 Ophthalmic Solution With Timolol Ophthalmic Solution in Patients With OAG or OH: RENGE Study
DOC.criteria: Patients with open angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension Patients at risk of progression of visual field loss Patients with severe visual field defect Patients with any diseases that preclude participation in this study for safety reasons
